author: Adam

review: Does what it says it will do.
author: DEAN W FULLER

review: At first I had some difficulty setting it up, but that was an issue with my wifi. Also not all of the apps that have Chromecast integration are well tested for bugs, but you can just restart the app (on whatever device you're using to connect to the Chromecast) and it should work perfectly. Minor issues with getting Netflix to pause were cured by restarting the app as well.
author: Gamer Chris

review: Streaming : basic streaming from youtube,spul and other similar products works greatScreen cast : screen duplication or projecting videos from the phone is very slow.
author: anik mankar
